name: The Hunger Jail
description:
Jails all over the world are running out of space. Get creative in your jail, don't let your budget run out !

Each prisoner has his own trait, use them to your advantage! Let them eat each other to reduce budget  cost. That's what a professional (probably evil) jailer does.

UPDATE: 

-Added more information to guide (click ? button in top-right corner).

- Add right mouse button to lock inmate information and hover on trait to show its description.

-Added Tutorial scenario.

-Added save and exit option in menu and Continue option in Main menu.
